overview:
Talia has been a dynamic innovator at the forefront of digital media creation and distribution since 2001.

Talia began promoting and implementing large-scale digital media strategies while consulting at the British Broadcasting Corporation throughout the UK with Rosenblum Associates, transitioning the BBC network model and training hundreds digital video literacy and technique. She went on to play a leading role in the development of the Digital Media Initiative at Erickson Retirement Communities, resulting in the creation of Retirement Living TV, currently available in over 29 million homes nationwide through Comcast and DirectTV. A cum laude graduate of New York University, Talia has produced original programming, web content, and promotional campaigns for clients including Microsoft, Nokia, Anheuser Busch, Sprite, Ralph Lauren, ABC, The Travel Channel, Plum TV, Titantv.com, UGO.com and Maxim Magazine Online. She is a critically acclaimed filmmaker, terrible guitar player (but getting better all the time) and proud dachshund owner in her spare time.
